entries.title: People Love Electric Vehicles! Now Comes the Hard Part
entries.description: EV sales are booming. But to keep the momentum going and make a dent in carbon emissions, the US will have to build a vast new charging infrastructure

entries.title: On-Demand Tailoring Brings the Gig Economy to Your Wardrobe
entries.description: A London-based startup is networking seamsters with the goal of personalizing fit and making garments last longer.

entries.title: Where the AI Art Boom Came From—and Where It’s Going
entries.description: In the past year algorithms got a lot better at generating illustrations, art, and photo-real scenes. Next up? Video.
